name: Space Simulator (itch) (AlfredSjodin)
description:
A Gravity simulation with many different planets. Use Arrow Keys to change planet and tool. You can always rightclick to use the create tool. Press O to acces the settings tab, there you can set a mass for the mouse tool, the higher mass the more powerfull   the mouse will get. The trail lenght can be used to give the planets a trail.

Create:

The create tool will spawn the selected planet at the mouse pointer. The Create  can be used with right click too.

Freeze:

The freeze tool requieras to clicks to freeze a planet in place, preventing it from moving.

Mouse:

The Mouse tool will give your mousepointer gravity with the mass set in the options tab. The mass starts at 0 meaning no effect, so remember to increase the mass.
